content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -11.5, 25.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5). The steam engine and boiler are currently not connected, while the offshore pump is operational.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions you are trying to connect are valid and not obstructed by other entities. Check the layout of existing pipes before attempting to reconnect.
- Verify that the entities you are trying to connect (e.g., boiler and steam engine) are positioned correctly and within range to establish a connection.
